Gemma, I just finished making a couple of goodies for my grandkids for tomorrow.  I made Oreo Truffles & Witches Broomsticks.  The broomsticks turned out so cute.  All you do is cut a mozzarella stick in three pieces, turn it so the longer piece is perpendicular to yourself & cut 3 to 4 little slashes only going about half way up.  Then you push a thin pretzel stick in the opposite end.  That's it & I know my son's their wives will appreciate one less sugary treat!  Oh my goodness though, I watched both of your videos, the S'More Pie & the Twix Pie!!  I swear I gained weight just watching them!!!! You make the best desserts!!  And my favorite thing about your recipes is how easy & quick they are, and no exotic ingredients.  I bet your neighbors all love to see you coming to neighborhood gatherings!!!
